subject: New DbUnit release version 1.4 featuring Ant task!
msgSnippet: DbUnit Version 1.4 has finally been released! The Dbunit database testing framework is a JUnit extension which sets up your database in a known state before
messageBody:
DbUnit Version 1.4 has finally been released!

The Dbunit database testing framework is a JUnit extension which
sets up your database in a known state before executing your tests.
This framework uses xml datasets (collection of data tables) and
performs database operations before and after each test.

The DbUnit home is located at http://www.dbunit.org

Among the new features are the new Ant Task (contributed by Timothy
Ruppert and Ben Cox), support for BLOB and CLOB, and DTD export of
database model for flat xml dataset.

Manuel
